mergeConfiguration.comment #1: Meaningless indicators (=indicators having but one legal value) are derived from melindaCustomMergeFields.
mergeConfiguration.comment #2: Meaningless indicators and non-filing indicators never prevent merge. (Hard-coded in mergableIndicator.js)
mergeConfiguration.comment #3: When merging, indicator preference has set defaults in mergeIndicators.js. However, these can be overridden here.
mergeConfiguration.comment #4: Non-filing indicators do not prevent field merge (their support is hard-coded). They are mainly listed here as an example.
mergeConfiguration.comment #5: If one indicator has value, and the other has not, it does not necessarily mean mismatch
